savings_income_ratio.definition: The portion of your income you save after covering your expenses.
savings_income_ratio.significance: Shows how disciplined you are at setting aside money for the future.

investment_income_ratio.definition: The share of your income that goes directly into investments each month.
investment_income_ratio.significance: Highlights how much of your earnings you're using to build wealth.

expense_income_ratio.definition: The fraction of your income used for everyday expenses.
expense_income_ratio.significance: Helps you understand living cost pressure relative to earnings.

debt_income_ratio.definition: The share of your income consumed by loan repayments.
debt_income_ratio.significance: Shows how much of your earnings are committed to debt repayment.

emergency_fund_ratio.definition: The number of months your emergency fund can cover your expenses.
emergency_fund_ratio.significance: Ensures you have a cushion in case of unexpected financial shocks.

liquidity_ratio.definition: The number of months your savings balacne can cover your expenses.
liquidity_ratio.formula: (Cash + Savings + Other Liquid Assets) ÷ Monthly Expenses

asset_liability_ratio.definition: Compares your total assets to total liabilities.
asset_liability_ratio.significance: Indicates overall financial stability and cushion.

housing_income_ratio.definition: The percentage of your income spent on housing (rent, maintainance).
housing_income_ratio.significance: Helps ensure your housing remains affordable.

health_insurance_adequacy.definition: How well your health insurance meets typical medical cost benchmarks.
health_insurance_adequacy.significance: Ensures you're protected against major health expenses.

term_insurance_adequacy.definition: How well your term insurance meets the needs of your dependents.
term_insurance_adequacy.significance: Provides financial security to your family in case of untimely death.

net_worth_adequacy.definition: Your net worth compared to your annual income.
net_worth_adequacy.significance: Shows wealth accumulation relative to earnings.

retirement_adequacy.definition: How close your current retirement savings are to your goal.
retirement_adequacy.formula: Current Retirement Savings ÷ Target Retirement Corpus
retirement_adequacy.significance: Indicates if you’re on track for retirement.
